page.title: 08Housing in Pontrhydyfen.
page.content:
We carried out a survey on houses by sending out {225}questionares,of which{104}were returned.Of the replies recieved,most houses were {50}to {100} years old.Many of the houses are terraced and were pre-war built.Some houses have been pulled down and new houses have been built on the sites. These new houses are mostly detached. Many of the older properties have been renovated and extended. These changes have brought a new appearance to some parts of the village.
